Event.EventName: You see there is a queue outside the shop.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Go to the back of the queue and wait in the line.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: It was correct to wait in the line and let key workers go in first.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Don't join the queue and go straight into the shop.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You didn't have to wait in queue but got some stares from people waiting in the line.
